properties.Name: Roselle Road bridge rebuilding, full interchange construction
Meacham Road bridge rebuilding and interchange work. Expect lane closures on Meacham.
New interchange at I-290 and Elgin O'Hare expressway (I-390), Eliminate Rohlwing Road and I-390 interchange. Some overnight closures on I-290 plus closures on local roads.
Interchange construction at I-57 and the Tri-State Tollway (I-294).
Lee Street bridge rebuilding. Some temporary I-90 overnight closures for bridge demolition.
Fox River bridge construction. Bike and pedestrian bridges will be closed.
Route 25 bridge reconstruction and interchange. Expect lane reductions on Route 25.
Barrington Road bridge rebuilding and full interchange. Temporary overnight lane closures.
Reconstruction of Kennedy Expressway and Ohio and Ontario feeder ramps
Rehabilitate bridge from Ogden Avenue and northound I-355 to westbound I-88. Bridge will be closed for a few weeks.
